messages.title: Bring Back Vince!
messages.content: I'm backing Vince. He is a huge person for us and I believe for our nation.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives are abandoning the pension 'triple lock' guarantee of increases in line with prices, earnings, or more. Basic pensions are very low, so I believe the guarantee must be maintained.
I have and will support local hospitals: West Middlesex, Kingston and Richmond. An extra penny on income tax, raising an average of £6.3bn a week, will ease the immediate NHS crisis.
Young families are also being hit by the severe cuts imposed by the Conservative government on our excellent local schools.

Conservatives have broken their previous pledge and approved the expansion of Heathrow, putting local people at risk. The Lib Dems will use their position to fight aviation pollution and remain opposed to a third runway.
I have personally backed RACC’s work supporting those with mental health issues. Now Lib Dems will match this with £1billion in extra funding.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Vince Cable or the Conservatives can win here!

issues.education: Young families are also being hit by the severe cuts imposed by the Conservative government on our excellent local schools. Teachers and assistants are being threatened with redundancy. I opposed these cuts when I was in government, and I will make fighting them a major priority if returned as your MP.
issues.health: I have and will support local hospitals: West Middlesex, Kingston and Richmond. An extra penny on income tax, raising an average of £6.3bn a week, will ease the immediate NHS crisis.
issues.transport: Conservatives have broken their previous pledge and approved the expansion of Heathrow, putting local people at risk. The Lib Dems will use their position to fight aviation pollution and remain opposed to a third runway.
issues.socialWelfare: Conservatives are abandoning the pension 'triple lock' guarantee of increases in line with prices, earnings, or more. Basic pensions are very low, so I believe the guarantee must be maintained.

community.content: Sir Vince's local popularity is a considerable advantage for the Lib Dems

politicalExperience.role: Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills
politicalExperience.achievements: Saw a huge increase in apprenticeships; and launched the Green Investment Bank and a Business Bank.
Helped 10,000 local people and a strong supporter of local voluntary groups/charities.
LSE, Nottingham University and St Mary's.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm backing Vince. He is a huge person for us and I believe for our nation.
I'm a life-long Labour supporter but I'm voting for Vince. He's the only one who bothers. I never knew an MP who took up cases like he did.

I resigned my membership of the Conservatives because I became increasingly disillusioned with their hard Brexit agenda and authoritarian leadership style for the many. Please lend me your support to Vince Cable and the Lib Dems.

quotes.text: Out on the campaign trail in Twickenham last week, one woman who had previously voted Conservative did not tell The Independent she thought Mrs May and the opposition leader Jeremy Corbyn were unfit to run the country.
Sir Vince's local popularity is a considerable advantage for the Lib Dems.

images.caption: Vince Cable will be a strong voice for our area in Parliament.

examples: An extra penny on income tax, raising an average of £6.3bn a week, will ease the immediate NHS crisis.
Five years as Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills saw a huge increase in apprenticeships; and launched the Green Investment Bank and a Business Bank.
I'm backing Vince. He is a huge person for us and I believe for our nation.
I'm a life-long Labour supporter but I'm voting for Vince. He's the only one who bothers. I never knew an MP who took up cases like he did.
Sir Vince's local popularity is a considerable advantage for the Lib Dems.
I have and will support local hospitals: West Middlesex, Kingston and Richmond.
Young families are also being hit by the severe cuts imposed by the Conservative government on our excellent local schools.
Conservatives have broken their previous pledge and approved the expansion of Heathrow, putting local people at risk.
Conservatives are abandoning the pension 'triple lock' guarantee of increases in line with prices, earnings, or more.
Sir Vince's local popularity is a considerable advantage for the Lib Dems.
